name: existentialistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to existentialism (= a system of ideas according to which the world has no meaning and each person is alone and completely responsible for their own actions): His ideas should not be interpreted existentialistically. It's a good example of an existentialistically inspired piece of theatre. Synonym
existentiallyRelated words
existentialism
existentialistic
More examplesFewer examplesThis concept is a feature of existentialistically oriented psychology.She argues that myths should be interpreted existentialistically.It's a philosophy that is existentialistically optimistic.Let us consider this question from an existentialistically influenced point of view.
